metadata.title: CVE-2016-6265 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
Use-after-free vulnerability in the pdf_load_xref function inpdf/pdf-xref.c in MuPDF allows remote attackers to cause a denial ofservice (crash) via a crafted PDF file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-6265` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

mupdf - 1.9a+ds1-1.1
mupdf-tools - 1.9a+ds1-1.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mupdf package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.9a+ds1-1.1').
